titleStmt.title: Instructions to be observed by the several justices of peace in the several counties within this Commonwealth, for the better prevention of robberies, burglaries, and other outrages
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Council of State.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
At end: "Signed in the name, and by order of the Councel of State, appointed by authority of Parliament."
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
